lead_paragraph: Just days before he was shot and killed, a Baton Rouge police officer posted an emotional Facebook message saying he was "physically and emotionally" tired and expressing how difficult it was to be both a police officer and a black man, a friend said Sunday.

headline.main: Slain Baton Rouge Officer Wrote Emotional Facebook Post
headline.print_headline: Slain Baton Rouge Officer Wrote Emotional Facebook Post
